SEARCH
Package game.main

Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.main.GameWorld
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1, Level2, Level3
public abstract class GameWorld extends city.cs.engine.World
Abstract base class that defines the shared behavior for all game levels. Handles player spawning, game over logic, and thief cat spawns.
